info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 3:26AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bee County through 400 AM CDT... At 326 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tulsita, or 11 miles south of Kenedy, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pawnee, Tulsita, Mineral and Pettus. This includes US Highway 181 between mile markers 572 and 574. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
